name: nativescript-hook-debug-production
description: Hook for selecting files based on debug or production build

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-hook-debug-production && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.resetdemo: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-hook-debug-production && tns plugin add .. && tns prepare android && cd ..
scripts.afterprepare: cd demo && tns prepare android && cd ..
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
